attributes.action: Ignore petitions asking for schools to be closed during the Covid-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: There is no scientific evidence to show that this will have a detrimental effect (increase in total deaths) across the nation over the extended time period, however the general intellectual level of our future generations, national productivity, innovation and progress will certainly be damaged by shutting down the education system.
attributes.background: Ignore calls to debate school and university closures and instead respect the need to educate our future generations despite risk to nation health.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
